Hydrogen Sulfide data from M. Gomes.
Worked up by Minming Cui

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
sulfideRaw <- read_excel(here::here("InputData", "cb2019_sulfide sample log (1) (1)(1).xlsx"), range = "A2:J20")
```

```{r}
ggplot(sulfideRaw, aes(y = `Depth (m)`, x = `correct concentration`)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  labs(x = "Sulfide (μM)") +
  facet_wrap(~Site) +
  #geom_vline(xintercept = 7.78 * 3) +
  theme_bw(base_size = 16)+
  lims(y = c(25, 0))
```


```{r}
sulfidePlot <- sulfideRaw %>% 
  arrange(Site) %>%
ggplot(aes(y = `Depth (m)`, x = `correct concentration`, shape = Site, fill = Site)) +
  geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  labs(x = "Sulfide (μM)") +
  #geom_vline(xintercept = 7.78 * 3) +
  theme_bw(base_size = 16)+
  lims(y = c(25, 0)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = viridis::plasma(n = 6)[3:4]) +
  scale_shape_manual(values = rep(21:25, 2)[3:4]) +
  cowplot::theme_cowplot() +
  theme(legend.position = "none", axis.title.y = element_blank(),
        axis.title.x = element_text(size = 11))
sulfidePlot
```

```{r}
ggsave(here("Figures", "sulfidePlot.png"), plot = sulfidePlot)
```
